title: Second round counselling doubt
content: I have 32xx rank and have taken cse aiml at ec campus. Is it possible to upgrade to cse core in second round with my rank? Also, if it's possible to get main cse, can I attend the counselling and get that seat without risking losing my current aiml seat? If possible, Please link any official sources from pes regarding this.

comments.body: You can attend without losing your seat but don’t get hopes up that cse core you’ll get.
